game.name: Idle Jumper
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Idle Jumper is a fast-paced platformer where your character jumps automatically, your job is to upgrade their abilities, and climb endlessly upward. Simple to start but deeply rewarding to optimize, Idle Jumper blends the addictive progression of an idle game with the feel of a endless jumper.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Idle Jumper is a fast-paced platformer where your character jumps automatically, your job is to upgrade their abilities, and climb endlessly upward. Simple to start but deeply rewarding to optimize, Idle Jumper blends the addictive progression of an idle game with the feel of a endless jumper.
